Reviews.Title: Good for the Price
Reviews.Author: Denise S
Reviews.Content: This camera is good for the beginning photographer.  It is light and very simply.  The zoom is great.  In rapid/burst shoot the pictures come out clear.  I had cameras before with rapid shoot they come out blurry.  Getting some great photos of my child playing soccer.  The videos come out clear and a distance from the videoed object it still picks up the audio. I would recommend the camera and for the price it is worth it.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: T. Jarvis
Reviews.Content: It is a very nice camera, light weight, takes excellent pictures and has great features. The only thing I dislike; it often displays a message to turn off the camera and turn it on again when first turned on, which it automatically does, but it is kind of annoying and takes time.

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: Jim Elmer
Reviews.Content: I like the camera, but I didn't pay attention to the product specs.  This model runs on AA batteries.  I thought it was the step up model that ran on a rechargeable battery pack.  Battery life is very good.  I've shot several hundred pictures on this set without changing.  It just wasn't expected.

Reviews.Title: Great for a beginner
Reviews.Author: Alexandra
Reviews.Content: So I'm a 17 year old girl and my mother is big into photography, she has one of those huge cameras with the interchangeable lenses. Compared to her intense camera, this camera is fabulous considering that it doesn't have special lenses. It's very easy to use and the pictures come out beautifully. The only thing I'd say I wish was better is the color of the pictures. I wish they were a little more true to the actual surrounds. But that just means I have to change the settings a little bit (which I'm not very good at). Overall, great camera!!

Reviews.Title: GREAT CAMERA
Reviews.Author: DAVE HEARD
Reviews.Content: Panasonic with out a doubt makes some of the best products on the market.  The Lumix digital cameras are excellent cameras that last for years of trouble free service.  Lumx cameras have all of the bells and whistles at a reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: works great
Reviews.Author: betonheckc
Reviews.Content: Bought this my daughters birthday. She loved it and so did I as we both learned to use it.  Very easy to use.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: Alfredo Rivadeneira
Reviews.Content: is all i want, de description is the same in the reallity, thanks for the camera is very nice.is recomended

Reviews.Title: lumix
Reviews.Author: Bernard Riley "halfpint"
Reviews.Content: a really nice camera for beginners,takes nice shots,pictures comes out in good quality,cant go wrong when you buy right .

Reviews.Title: Great camera, great purchase experience!
Reviews.Author: Dianne More
Reviews.Content: This was a great buy and the experience with BLINQ was very professional.  I love my new Panasonic Lumix camera.

Reviews.Title: Its okay, nothing special to it, It takes decent pics
Reviews.Author: Lourdes
Reviews.Content: This is an okay camera, consider it being an older model, old firmware has nothing special to offer. Uses AA batteries so enjoy spending money on that. Over all It does take pictures and that's all I expected from it ._.

Reviews.Title: a lot of camera for the money
Reviews.Author: PRESSON
Reviews.Content: appears to be a lot of camera for the $. taking it to Alaska in august 2013, expecting great results. my pastor has a similar Panasonic and loves it.

Reviews.Title: PANASONIC'S Worst Yet?
Reviews.Author: f5mando
Reviews.Content: Not up to Panasonic's FZ range, this bridge camera is a cheapo version of the DMC-FZ35 which I bought for my wife a few years ago.When shooting video this one sporadically 'hunts' for focus, even while a live subject is just talking to camera.It is slow, and the AA batteries add a lot to the weight. Save up around $500 and buy an SLR with interchangeable lenses. A Canon would be a good choice.Purchasing this was false economy - and this model has since been superseded by a DMC-LZ30 (bigger zoom), but the pricing unrealistically close to the cost of superior equipment. As the father of a friend of mine used to say, "You're not rich enough to but cheap".I returned mine, and would not recommend it to anyone but my enemies. It is fitted with a Leica lens, but that's a lot like installing racing slicks on a Yugo..Move along, now..

Reviews.Title: Just didn't like this camera.
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: I returned this within an hour of receiving it. First of all it seemed fragile, maybe my imagination but that's how it felt to me. I put my own batteries and SD card in it and took some test pictures. There was nothing particularly wrong with them, but they were no better than my simple Nikon AW100. Focus seemed questionable to me also, especially for macro stuff.Cost me 6.30 return shipping, but just not the right camera for me.

ProductInfo.Features:
Powerful 21x Optical Zoom with 16.1-megapixel Full-resolution
25mm Ultra Wide-angle Lens
Large, 3.0-inch, 460K-dot LCD with 100% Field of View
720p HD Video Recording
ProductInfo.Name: Panasonic Lumix DMC-LZ20K 16 MP Digital Camera with 21x Opitcal Zoom and 3-inch LCD - Black
